      • getRelativePath

        public java.nio.file.Path getRelativePath()
        戻り値:
        the relative path of the MaterialIO file, relative to the root dir. On Mac and Linux, the path separator will be '/', On Windows, the path separator will be '\'

        Materialオブジェクトが表すファイルのパスただしrootを基底とする相対パスを返す。

        ああ、このメソッドひとつをきれいに実装するために materialstore を作ったのだ。 Materialsライブラリのぐちゃぐちゃさ加減に比べてこの実装の簡潔なことよ。

      • toFile

        public java.io.File toFile(java.nio.file.Path root)
                    throws MaterialstoreException
        例外:
        MaterialstoreException

      • toPath

        public java.nio.file.Path toPath(java.nio.file.Path root)
                          throws MaterialstoreException
        例外:
        MaterialstoreException

      • toPath

        public java.nio.file.Path toPath(Store store)
                          throws MaterialstoreException
        例外:
        MaterialstoreException

      • toURL

        public java.net.URL toURL(java.nio.file.Path root)
                   throws MaterialstoreException
        returns a URL in the form of "file:/". The path will be an absolute path.
        例外:
        MaterialstoreException

      • getRelativeURL

        public java.lang.String getRelativeURL()
        戻り値:
        the returned value of getRelative() is stringified, and replace all of `\` character to `/` to make it a valid relative URL string.

        public java.lang.String getShortId()

      • isSimilarTo

        public boolean isSimilarTo(Material other)
        checks if this has the same FileType and Metadata as the other. JobName and JobTimestamp are disregarded.
